caption.p: A549 cells transiently expressing a ZIKV replicon are protected against cell death by apoptosis. A549 cells were transfected with ZIKV amplicons (Z genomic overlapping fragments) for production of REP BR15 (Z1, 2, 3 and 4) and REP NEG (Z2, 3 and 4) or with pEGFP-N1 ( A). At 48 h after transfection A549 cells were treated with etoposide for 16 h ( B) or UV at 400 mJ ( C). The percentage of A549 cells immunostained with anti-BAX antibody or anti-cleaved CASP 3 was monitored. Values represent the mean and standard deviation of three independent experiments. Data were analyzed by a one-way ANOVA test with post-hoc Tukeyâ€™s test (* p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001, ns = not significant).
